Package org.ginsim.core.graph

Interface Graph<V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the edge E
    V - the vertex V
    All Superinterfaces:
    GraphModel<V,​E>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicGraph, HierarchicalTransitionGraph, ReducedGraph<AG,​AV,​AE>, RegulatoryGraph, TransitionGraph<V,​E>, TrapSpaceInclusionDiagram, Tree
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDerivedGraph, AbstractGraph, DynamicGraphImpl, HierarchicalTransitionGraphImpl, ReducedGraphImpl, RegulatoryGraphImpl, TransitionGraphImpl, TrapSpaceTreeImpl, TreeImpl
    public interface Graph<V,​E extends Edge<V>>
extends GraphModel<V,​E>
    The main graph object in GINsim. Beside the basic graph methods from the GraphModel interface, this provides access to the view (styles and attribute readers), and define methods to save a graph.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi, Lionel Spinelli

      • addViewListener

        void addViewListener​(GraphViewListener listener)
        Add a listener for view change events. Note: only one listener is supported: the GraphGUI
        Parameters:

      • copyView

        void copyView​(Graph<V,​E> src,
              ViewCopyHelper<Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E> helper)
        Transfer view settings from a related graph. The position and styles of matching nodes and edges will be copied from the source graph to the current one
        Parameters:
        src - the source graph
        helper - copy helper

      • fireGraphChange

        void fireGraphChange​(GraphChangeType type,
                     Object data)
        The graph has changed, all listeners will be notified. It will also be marked as unsaved.
        Parameters:
        type - graphchange type
        data - object data
